mapper.sql: a.id, a.workshop_id AS "workshop.id", c.shopName as "workshop.shopName", a.lineName, a.lineNumber, a.lineMaster, a.lineDescription, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag
LEFT JOIN bas_workshop c ON c.id = a.workshop_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bas_line a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY lineName,lineNumber
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bas_line( id, lineName, lineNumber, lineMaster, lineDescription, workshop_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{lineName}, #{lineNumber}, #{lineMaster}, #{lineDescription}, #{workshop.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bas_line SET lineName = #{lineName}, lineNumber = #{lineNumber}, lineMaster = #{lineMaster}, lineDescription = #{lineDescription}, workshop_id = #{workshop.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
